package.name: AW_FPS
package.description: Featured Products Slideshow allows you to place slideshow of your featured products on any page of your Magento store. They'll be rotated by means of a JS script.
package.notes: To use the extension place the following code: ---------------------------------------------------------------- {{block type="catalog/product/aw_fps" template="catalog/product/aw_fps.phtml"}} ---------------------------------------------------------------- on any page with the help of Magento CMS. After this done, go to Admin->Catalog->Manage Products->edit a product and set "Rotate in featured products slideshow" to "Yes". Navigate to the page in which you inserted the block above and enjoy the slideshow.
